Name: plc-event-logging-solution
Author: Pathlock
Description: The Pathlock Cloud Event Logging Solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest critical event data, including process failures and high-risk access changes, directly into a custom log table using the Logs Ingestion API (DCE/DCR)
WorkbookBladeDescription: This solution installs a pre-built Workbook to visualize Pathlock Cloud event data.
AnalyticalRuleBladeDescription: This solution does not currently include analytical rules.
HuntingQueryBladeDescription: This solution does not currently include hunting queries.
PlaybooksBladeDescription: No playbooks are included in this version of the solution.
